meanings.definition: The act or skill of writing with a typewriter.
meanings.sent1: Her typewritings were neat and precise, showing her mastery of the typewriter.
meanings.sent2: The typewritings on the paper were clear and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: His typewritings were so perfect that they almost looked printed!
meanings.sent4: In a world of keyboards, her typewritings stood out like a vintage melody.
meanings.sent5: The typewritings on the page seemed to dance with elegance and order.

meanings.definition: Written material produced with a typewriter.
meanings.sent1: The archive contained a collection of typewritings from the 1950s.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading old typewritings to experience a different era.
meanings.sent3: The typewritings in the museum made visitors nostalgic for a simpler time.
meanings.sent4: His typewritings were like time capsules, preserving moments in ink.
meanings.sent5: The typewritings held a charm that digital texts could never replicate.
